title: Every Single Barden Bella Performance from the Pitch Perfect Movies | TUNE
author: TUNE - Musical Moments

detail.Title: Every Single Barden Bella Performance from the Pitch Perfect Movies | TUNE
detail.Description:
Looking for ALL the Barden Bellas Performances? From the iconic finale cover of Don't You Forget About Me in Pitch Perfect to a bad-ass cover of Britney Spears' Toxic in Pitch Perfect 3, it's here! Which is your favourite Barden Bella song? Let us know in the comments!

00:00 - The Sign - Pitch Perfect
01:00 - Turn the Beat Around - Pitch Perfect
01:32 - The Sign/Turn the Beat Around/Eternal Flame - Pitch Perfect
03:48 - The Sign/Bulletproof - Pitch Perfect
04:50 - Bellas Finals - Pitch Perfect
08:26 - Kennedy Centre Performance - Pitch Perfect 2
10:40 - Promises/Problem - Pitch Perfect 2
12:17 - Bellas World Championship Finale - Pitch Perfect 2
16:22 - Cheap Thrills - Pitch Perfect 3
18:37 - I Don't Like It, I Love It - Pitch Perfect 3
20:52 - Toxic - Pitch Perfect 3
25:03 - Freedom! '90 - Pitch Perfect 3

What are the Pitch Perfect movies about?
Arriving at her new college, Beca (Anna Kendrick) finds herself not right for any clique but somehow is muscled into one that she never would have picked on her own: alongside mean girls, sweet girls and weird girls whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together. When Beca leads this a cappella singing group out of their traditional arrangements and perfect harmonies into all-new mash-ups, they fight to climb their way to the top of college music competitions. The film series stars Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Skylar Astin and more.
Watch all three Pitch Perfect movies here: https://www.uphe.com/movies/pitch-perfect-trilogy

Welcome to TUNE, a channel that celebrates the musical moments in film. From the movie musicals to the musical biopic, we'll be bringing you iconic scenes and the tunes you love!
